taxonomy.title: Office of the Historian Subject Taxonomy of the History of U.S. Foreign Relations
taxonomy.subtitle: Collection: Secretarial Tenures

description.p:
The Subject Taxonomy of the History of U.S. Foreign Relations is a hierarchical taxonomy that consists of categories and tags. The taxonomy is organized into ___ top-level categories:
Agreements and Mandates
Events
Organizations
People
Places
Topics Below these top-level categories are additional nested levels of categories and tags, becoming more specific at deeper levels.

collection.label: Secretarial Tenures
collection.definition: Secretaries of State of the United States of America.
